# Population size and viability models

Various methods are available to estimate species biomass, population size, or extirpation risk, including those which employ population viability analysis or age-structured population models.

## Data requirements/sources
Geospatial model of the river network (e.g., [NHDPlus](https://www.usgs.gov/national-hydrography/nhdplus-high-resolutio)), passability of barriers (see [Kemp & O'Hanley 2010](https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1365-2400.2010.00751.x)), and other required inputs for the population viability analysis or age-structured population model.
